titles.title: It Takes Time For A Little Seed To Grow

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It takes time for a little seed to grow.
It takes time for a little tree to grow.
It takes time for the fruit to come forth.
It takes time; it takes a little time for life to grow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spend a little time in fellowship with the Lord.
Spend a little time in prayer on your knees.
Spend a little time in reading God's Word.
It takes time; it takes a little time for life to grow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And in God's time the little seed will grow.
And in God's time the little tree will grow.
And in God's time the fruit will come forth.
And God's time, God's perfect time, life will come forth.
